A Data Manifest for Contextualized Telemetry Data A Data Manifest for Contextualized Telemetry Data
draft-ietf-opsawg-collected-data-manifest-06 draft-ietf-opsawg-collected-data-manifest-07
Abstract Abstract
Network platforms use Model-driven Telemetry, such as YANG-Push, to Network platforms use Model-driven Telemetry, such as YANG-Push, to
continuously stream information, including both counters and state continuously stream information, including both counters and state
information. This document describes the metadata that ensure that information. This document describes the metadata that ensure that
the collected data can be interpreted correctly. This document the collected data can be interpreted correctly. This document
specifies the data manifest, composed of two YANG data models (the specifies the data manifest, composed of two YANG data models (the
platform manifest and the data collection manifest). These YANG platform manifest and the non-normative data collection manifest).
modules are specified at the network (e.g. controller) level to These YANG modules are specified at the network (e.g. controller)
provide a model that encompasses several network platforms. The data level to provide a model that encompasses several network platforms.
manifest must be streamed and stored along with the data, up to the The data manifest must be streamed and stored along with the data, up
collection and analytics systems in order to keep the collected data to the collection and analytics systems in order to keep the
fully exploitable by the data scientists and relevant tools. collected data fully exploitable by the data scientists and relevant
Additionally, this document proposes an augmentation of the YANG-Push tools. Additionally, this document proposes an augmentation of the
model to include the actual collection period, in case it differs YANG-Push model to include the actual collection period, in case it
from the configured collection period. differs from the configured collection period.

1. Introduction 1. Introduction
Network platforms use Model-driven Telemetry (MDT), such as YANG-Push Network platforms use Model-driven Telemetry (MDT), such as YANG-Push
[RFC8641], to continuously stream information, including both [RFC8641], to continuously stream information, including both
counters and state information. counters and state information.
This document specifies what needs to be kept as metadata to ensure This document specifies what needs to be kept as metadata to ensure
that the collected data can still be interpreted correctly throughout that the collected data can still be interpreted correctly throughout
the collection and network analytics toolchain. When streaming YANG- the collection and network analytics toolchain. When streaming YANG-

This document introduces the data manifest, which is composed of two This document introduces the data manifest, which is composed of two
YANG data models, namely, the platform manifest and the data YANG data models, namely, the platform manifest and the data
collection manifest, in order to keep the collected data exploitable collection manifest, in order to keep the collected data exploitable
by the data scientists and relevant tools. by the data scientists and relevant tools.
The platform manifest contains information characterizing the The platform manifest contains information characterizing the
platform streaming the telemetry information, while the data platform streaming the telemetry information, while the data
collection manifest contains the required information to characterize collection manifest contains the required information to characterize
how and when the telemetry information was metered. The platform how and when the telemetry information was metered. The platform
manifest is specified in Section 5. The data collection manifest is manifest is specified in Section 5. An example of data collection
specified in Section 6. manifest is specified in Section 6. This module is non-normative due
to the lack of design-time schema mount in YANG, see Section 1 of
[RFC8528] .
The two proposed YANG modules for the data manifest do not expose any The two proposed YANG modules for the data manifest do not expose any
new information but rather define what should be exposed by a new information but rather define what should be exposed by a
platform streaming or storing telemetry data. Some related YANG platform streaming or storing telemetry data. Some related YANG
modules have been specified to retrieve the platform capabilities modules have been specified to retrieve the platform capabilities
such as: such as:

module: example-collection-manifest module: example-collection-manifest
+--ro data-collections +--ro data-collections
+--mp data-collection* [platform-id] +--mp data-collection* [platform-id]

| +--ro stream* [name] | +--ro stream* [name]
| +--ro name string | +--ro name string
| +--ro description? string | +--ro description? string
